phase1_foundation.database_schema.notes: Enhanced PostgreSQL schema with pgvector, optimized indexes, search functions, and performance improvements

phase1_foundation.environment_config.notes: Created comprehensive environment configuration with templates for API keys, database settings, search parameters, logging, and Docker deployment configurations

phase2_services.document_processor.notes: Enhanced document processor service with intelligent markdown chunking, improved error handling, health checks, and HTTP monitoring server. Added support for code block preservation, table handling, and comprehensive logging.

phase2_services.search_api.notes: Created comprehensive FastAPI search service with semantic, full-text, and hybrid search endpoints. Includes PostgreSQL pgvector integration, Voyage AI embeddings, health checks, statistics endpoint, and proper error handling. Service is containerized with Dockerfile and includes all necessary dependencies.

phase2_services.docker_integration.notes: Updated docker-compose.yml with comprehensive service integration including custom networking, enhanced health checks, proper service dependencies (postgres → processor → API), logging configuration, and volume management. Removed duplicate content and added container names for easier management.

phase2_services.embedding_service.notes: Created self-hosted embedding service using sentence-transformers with FastAPI. Includes multiple model options, health checks, Docker containerization, and REST API for generating embeddings locally without external dependencies.

phase3_testing.document_processing_test.notes: A test-local bash script has been created which populates the database.
